column2: an A.M. Eatery////The food was okay. I ordered a pancake sampler. My issue with the food is that any of their sweeter breakfast items (pancakes
column4: etc) are just way too sweet. It feels like everything is just drowned in sugar. Also
column7: though it is a bit hard to compete with all the specialty coffee shops in that area. The savory food items were decent
column8: and the prices were as well. The staff was nice too.
